segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside is pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm she is while everything is going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are so focused on the cookies that they don't see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool like it's the most natural thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her turn, completely unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the water will reach the stool before someone falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a strange scene, like a moment frozen in time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but laugh at how absurd this all is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt, but it's hard not to find it a little funny.
segments.speaker: PAR
